GLIF.L.summary: GLI Finance Limited provides alternative finance services. The company operates in two segments, Sancus BMS and FinTech Ventures. It offers property backed and small and medium sized enterprise loans. The company also invests in a portfolio of SME focused lending platforms. It operates in the United Kingdom, Ireland, Jersey, Guernsey, Gibraltar, Isle of Man, the United States, France, Spain, and Cameroon. The company was formerly known as Greenwich Loan Income Fund Limited and changed its name to GLI Finance Limited in April 2013. GLI Finance Limited was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Saint Peter Port, the United Kingdom.
